hero.title: A Licensed Teaching Studio. Built for Intentional,Professional Use
hero.subtitle: Ready When You Are
hero.description: A fully equipped, compliant classroom in the city's core—designed for instructors and organizations who value predictability, credibility, and ease. You arrive. You teach. We handle the rest.

useCases.title: An urban solution to your education needs.

weeklyClass.title: Run a Weekly Class
weeklyClass.description: You have students. You need a consistent, licensed space every week—without managing a lease or facility.

testCourse.title: Test a New Course
testCourse.description: Launch a pilot, gather real feedback, validate market fit before long-term commitment.

intensive.title: Host an Intensive or Workshop
intensive.description: Short-term programs, exam prep, specialized sessions—fully compliant and ready to teach in.

professionalTraining.title: Deliver Professional Training
professionalTraining.description: For associations, academies, and organizations that require a licensed, central venue.

seminar.title: Host a Hybrid Learning Session
seminar.description: Blend in-person and remote participants in a professional setting—ideal for webinars, Q&As, and distributed training.

popupClass.title: Book Flexible, Short-Term Access
popupClass.description: Ad-hoc sessions, guest instructors, one-off events—premium space, no long-term contract required.

1.title: Explore the Space
1.description: Review our access options, pricing logic, and use cases online.

2.title: Submit Your Request
2.description: Tell us what you plan to teach and when you'd like to use the space.

3.title: Review & Tour
3.description: For all types of requests, we'll schedule a brief tour to introduce you to the space and confirm fit.

4.title: Get Scheduled
4.description: Once approved, your time is reserved.

hero.title: A Professional Teaching Studio at the City's Center
hero.description: A Classroom Built for Real Teaching

environment.title: The Environment
environment.intro: A Classroom Built for Serious Instructors

features.licensed: Licensed and compliant for education use
features.simple: Equipped for immediate use—no setup required
features.exclusive: One class at a time—no noise overlap or scheduling conflicts

environment.outro: You arrive ready to teach. We handle everything else.

location.title: Why Central Location Matters
location.description1: The studio is located in the city's professional core, within a high-quality commercial building designed for serious business use.

benefits.accessible: Easy to reach for students across the city
benefits.transport: Close to transport, offices, and daily amenities
benefits.professional: Suitable for working professionals and adult learners
benefits.premium: Positioned as a premium, intentional learning experience

location.description3: The venue does part of your credibility work for you.

pricing.title: Access Options: Priced by Commitment
pricing.subtitle: We price based on predictability — More consistency means better rates—it's that simple.

flexible.title: Flexible Access
flexible.subtitle: For occasional or short-term use
flexible.note: Typical users: Guest instructors · One-off workshops · Pilot courses · Specialized sessions

committed.title: Committed Access
committed.subtitle: For weekly or recurring programs
features: Fixed weekly schedule (4+ hours per week)
committed.note: Typical users: Independent instructors · Small academies · Professional associations · Ongoing classes

resident.title: Resident Access
resident.subtitle: For established, long-term programs
features: Reserved time slots across the week
Designed for stability (3+ months or 12+ hours per week)
resident.note: Typical users: Established academies · Certification providers · Institutional partners · Core programs

audience.title: Who This Space Works Best For

instructors.title: Independent Instructors
instructors.description: You teach regularly. You want a reliable, professional classroom without the burden of running a facility. This is built for you.

academies.title: Academies & Associations
academies.description: You run structured programs that demand consistency, licensing, compliance, and central access. We provide the infrastructure so you focus on instruction.

institutions.title: Institutions & Corporate Training
institutions.description: You require licensed space, clear operations, transparent scheduling, and predictable costs. No surprises. No chaos.

shortTerm.title: Short-Term Specialized Programs & Events
shortTerm.description: You need a ready-to-use classroom for a defined period—workshops, intensives, certifications, guest-led sessions. No long-term obligations required.

1.title: Review Information Online
1.description: Understand how the space operates, which access level fits your use, and what to expect.

2.title: Submit Your Request
2.description: Share your class details, schedule preferences, and how you plan to use the space.

3.title: Tour & Review (if needed)
3.description: For all types of requests, we'll walk through the space together—about 15 minutes. This confirms we're a good fit for each other.

4.title: Confirm & Schedule
4.description: Once approved, your access is secured.

closing.text1: This space is designed for instructors who understand that environment shapes teaching.
closing.text2: If you value clarity, consistency, and a professional foundation, you've found the right place.

step2.title: Class Details
step2.description: Tell us about the class or program you'd like to teach.

placeholders.classDescription: Describe your class, subject matter, and learning objectives...
placeholders.preferredTimes: e.g., Mondays 6-8pm, or flexible weekday mornings

step3.title: Access Option
step3.description: Select the access option that best fits your needs.
step3.placeholder: Any additional information or special requirements...

step4.title: Equipment & Technology
step4.description: Select any additional equipment or technology you'll need for your class.

step5.title: Review Your Request
step5.note: Please review your information below. This is a booking request, not an instant booking. We'll review your request and get back to you shortly to confirm availability and next steps.

confirmation.title: Request Received
confirmation.message: Your booking request has been received.
confirmation.description1: We've received your request and will review it carefully. Our team will get back to you via phone within the next 24 hours to discuss availability and next steps.
confirmation.description2: This is a request, not an instant booking. We'll work with you to find the best time and access option for your needs.
confirmation.urgent: If you have any urgent questions, please don't hesitate to reach out.

footer.tagline: A licensed, fully equipped education space
